channel.title: Can't compile a patch
channel.description:
Hi everyone,
This is my first post (read cry for help :) ) on the forum. I have Axoloti for a month and this problem is something that I can't solve myself. Since today I receive an error while trying to compile a patch. It happens with all the patches. Here's what Axoloti says:
file error: FR_NOT_ENABLED, filename:"/p_dilej_ritam pech " Start compiling patch java.io.IOException: Cannot run program "K:\Program" (in directory "K:\Program Files (x86)\Axoloti\app\firmware"): CreateProcess error=2, The system cannot find the file specified java.io.IOException: Cannot run program "K:\Program" (in directory "K:\Program Files (x86)\Axoloti\app\firmware"): CreateProcess error=2, The system cannot find the file specified at java.lang.ProcessBuilder.start(ProcessBuilder.java:1048) at java.lang.Runtime.exec(Runtime.java:620) at java.lang.Runtime.exec(Runtime.java:450) at qcmds.QCmdShellTask.Do(QCmdShellTask.java:114) at qcmds.QCmdProcessor.run(QCmdProcessor.java:190) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:745) Caused by: java.io.IOException: CreateProcess error=2, The system cannot find the file specified at java.lang.ProcessImpl.create(Native Method) at java.lang.ProcessImpl.<init>(ProcessImpl.java:386) at java.lang.ProcessImpl.start(ProcessImpl.java:137) at java.lang.ProcessBuilder.start(ProcessBuilder.java:1029) ... 5 more
Compiling patch failed ( L:\axo\moi\p_dilej_ritam pech 2.axp )
I would appreciate any help.
Thanks!

item.title: Can't compile a patch
item.dc:creator: @smallnikoff Aleksandar Nikov
item.description:
@smallnikoff wrote:

It seems that's the case. The problem appeared "overnight". AVG suddenly prompted that Axoloti might be a threat. I didn't think it will cause any troubles since I clicked "Ignore threat". Fortunately, everything is fine now

Read full topic

item.title: Can't compile a patch
item.dc:creator: @johannes johannes
item.description:
@johannes wrote:

If this problem appeared "overnight", I suspect a virus or malware scanner was over-active.

Read full topic

item.title: Can't compile a patch
item.dc:creator: @smallnikoff Aleksandar Nikov
item.description:
@smallnikoff wrote:

Hi again everyone,

I solved the problem by reinstalling the Axoloti patcher. The old patches still work.

One small step for a man, one giant leap for non coders

Read full topic
